page.content: 5.TRAVELLING TO HOBBY Asked how far they travelled to participate in their favourite hobby, 41.1% had home based hobbies; 30.4% travelled 5 miles or less; 3.6% between 6 and 10 miles; 5.3% between 11 and 15 miles; 3.6% over 20 miles; 16.1% travelled variable distances. 6.HOW LONG HAS THIS BEEN YOUR HOBBY? 34.7% said they had been participating in their favourite hobby for five years or less; 20,4% for between 6 and 10 years; 14.3 for between 11 and 15 years; 20.4% for between 16 and 20 years; 10.2% for over 20 years. 7.THE COST OF LEISURE Asked what they spent each year on their favourite hobby, 9.4% spent less than Â£10; 47.2% between Â£10 and Â£50; 11.3% between Â£51 and Â£100; 32.1% spent over Â£100. Four people said their hobby earned them money.
